website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking to take your grilling to the next level, the various features of this model should fit your needs.
pros: A large surface area with many burners
Six separate cooking zones Numerous features, including a propane meter, night lights, and rotisserie
cons: The materials used in its construction are pretty lightweight, which may affect durability
Some buyers report problems with temperature control, and the igniter in particular is prone to problems

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have had this grill for about 1 year now. I love it. Im pretty good about when grilling to put the cover on, but my husband is not. We haven't had any rust. And this grill just cooks the meat so evenly and and I love it! Still looks great and it is nice and heavy duty. 5 stars for me!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: but (picture) illustrations were very easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Grill delivered very quickly. Minor damage to bottom frame, which I straightened (somewhat). Took me about 3 hours to assemble, but (picture) illustrations were very easy to follow. Everything works fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Bought from homedepot! Bought this grill two years ago it has been kept under a enclosed porch and it has completely fell apart. After talking to customer service about warranty which was another hassle, they were going to give me a deal on replacement part ( all grates, all the burners, flavor bars, top rack and the bottom big catch and the protects the propane tank and hoses) well after looking at the the frame it has fell apart so bad that you can not even put, the new burner or grates back in so I'm dead in the water. Will not be buying another nexgrill. Have pics but guess you can't post them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All sizzle no steak.
customer_reviews.text: In full disclosure I did not buy this grill on Amazon, I bought it at Home Depot directly on sale. But still I felt compelled to share my experience with others. In short I would skip this one. This grill looks great in pictures but as soon as you actually get it and open the lid and feel the construction you’ll have a very different opinion. This thing is VERY cheaply constructed with extremely thin metal and the so called stainless steel rusts quickly. It does seem, with gas grills at least, you get what you pay for. This unit is relatively inexpensive for all you Think you are getting and there is a reason why.
customer_reviews.author: MA burbster

customer_reviews.title: Great size. You better buy a grill cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought from HD not amazon but grill is going on year #2 with full force. No complaints at all. Great size. You better buy a grill cover !!!!
customer_reviews.author: CampLife

customer_reviews.title: Collapsed under its own weight
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this grill for the past month wheeling it out every Friday for our weekly barbecues. Within a week the wheels had fallen off. By the end of the month the hole thing was a pile of scrap metal
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap flame guards
customer_reviews.text: Since this grill cost a little more than some other brands I had higher expectations but now that all of my flame guards/heat tents are falling apart after only 2 years I am pretty disappointed. I know this is common with gas grills, I just expected these to last longer. I hope my burners last long enough to justify spending $500 on a grill. Unless you can make your own heavy duty replacement flame guards like me I suggest either getting the cheapest grill you can and plan to replace it every few years, or save up for something like a Weber.
customer_reviews.author: Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took exactly 2 hours from start to finish with my husband doing the majority of it alone. It's a great looking grill and very sturdy. We used the sear plate and grilled the last night and are using the rotisserie now. The LED lights didn't work at 1st, but we switched out batteries and they work great. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Too many flare ups. Regrettable purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst grill I have ever owned. I purchased it a year ago because it was highly rated As a “Best Buy” on consumer reports. Nearly every time I cook a steak, it gets charred because the grates are way to close to the heat shields and they flare ups on constant. I regret spending $500+ on this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: Small Grease Trap Fills with Water when it Rains
customer_reviews.text: Nextgrill Customer Support says they recommend a cover, so make sure to order one if you purchase this grill, because the tiny grease pan fills with water each time it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Coda

product_meta.title: Deluxe 6-Burner Gas Grill with Searing Side Burner in Slate
product_meta.description: Expand your grilling repertoire with the Nexgrill Deluxe Series 6-Burner Gas Grill in Slate. It is equipped with a 15,000 BTU ceramic searing side burner that sears meats to juicy perfection and includes a plug-in rotisserie kit to evenly cook chicken, roasts, pork or anything else you want to rotate on a spit. For nighttime grilling, engage the blue LED lighting system to illuminate the front control panel for no-fuss operability. Boasting a massive 560 sq. in. primary grilling area with six stainless steel burners, it's outfitted with porcelain-enameled cast iron cooking grates that retain heat exceptionally well. An upper-level 200 sq. in. porcelain-coated warming rack heats up buns and keeps cooked foods toasty.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars18 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
